---
id: create-object
title: "Create object"
description: "Creates a new object in the specified space using a JSON payload. The creation process is subject to rate limiting. The payload must include key details such as the object name, icon, description, body content (which may support Markdown), source URL (required for bookmark objects), template identifier, and the type_key (which is the non-unique identifier of the type of object to create). Post-creation, additional operations (like setting featured properties or fetching bookmark metadata) may occur. The endpoint then returns the full object data, ready for further interactions."
sidebar_label: "Create object"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: docs/reference/2025-04-22/anytype-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import Translate from "@docusaurus/Translate";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create object"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/spaces/{space_id}/objects"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new object in the specified space using a JSON payload. The creation process is subject to rate limiting. The payload must include key details such as the object name, icon, description, body content (which may support Markdown), source URL (required for bookmark objects), template identifier, and the type_key (which is the non-unique identifier of the type of object to create). Post-creation, additional operations (like setting featured properties or fetching bookmark metadata) may occur. The endpoint then returns the full object data, ready for further interactions.

  as={"h2"}

</Heading>
